content:
CustomBuildEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the CustomEventRaised event of a build.

In this Article

public delegate void CustomBuildEventHandler(object sender, CustomBuildEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
CustomBuildEventHandler
